movies.Title: The Intouchables
movies.Writer: Olivier Nakache, Philippe Pozzo di Borgo (adapted from his autobiographical tale Le Second Souffle), Éric Toledano
movies.Actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movies.Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 38 wins & 39 nominations.

movies.Title: The Prestige
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
movies.Actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo
movies.Plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 38 nominations.

movies.Title: Dr. No
movies.Writer: Richard Maibaum (screenplay), Johanna Harwood (screenplay), Berkely Mather (screenplay), Ian Fleming (novel)
movies.Actors: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Joseph Wiseman, Jack Lord
movies.Plot: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.
movies.Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
